subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Halep, the No.3 seed and a finalist at Roland Garros last year, lost to 70th-ranked Mirjana Lucic-Baroni, who stunned Halep in similar fashion at the U.S. Open last summer.
snippet: Halep, the No.3 seed and a finalist at Roland Garros last year, lost to 70th-ranked Mirjana Lucic-Baroni, who stunned Halep in similar fashion at the U.S. Open last summer.
